leaflet.constituency: West Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Derek grew up in West Cornwall and is a Cornish Mason. He has been active in the constituency for over twenty years.
As the Parliamentary Candidate, Derek has championed this unique constituency within the Conservative Party. An MP in a Party of Government would be good news for Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly.

politicalExperience.achievements: Derek has served as a District Councillor since 2009 and lives with his young family in Porthleven.

contactInformation.address: Alexandra House, Alexandra Road, Penzance, Cornwall, TR18 4LZ

images.caption: 3 Positive Reasons To Vote for Derek Thomas
A Future for West Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly
